---
title: Links
sidebar:
  order: 2
slug: shopify/general/links
---

There are some links you may need that require a custom attribute to be reflected correctly once in Shopify. In the following list you can find these links.

## Policy Links
These links refer to policy pages such as privacy, refund, etc. Each one need a corresponding attribute:

<custom-attribute name="policy-link" value="refund"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Refund Link"></copy-element>

<custom-attribute name="policy-link" value="privacy"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Privacy Policy Link"></copy-element>

<custom-attribute name="policy-link" value="shipping"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Shipping Link"></copy-element>

<custom-attribute name="policy-link" value="subscription"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Subscription Link"></copy-element>

<custom-attribute name="policy-link" value="terms"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Terms & Conditions Link"></copy-element>

<custom-attribute name="policy-link" value="legal"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Legal Link"></copy-element>

## Product Link

This is a link to a specific product page. You can use it on a link element by adding the attribute:

<custom-attribute dynamic name="product-link" value="product-handle"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Product Link"></copy-element>

## Collection Link

This is a link to a specific collection page. You can use it on a link element by adding the attribute:

<custom-attribute dynamic name="collection-link" value="collection-handle"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Collection Link"></copy-element>


## Blog Link

This is a link to a specific blog page. You can use it on a link element by adding the attribute:

<custom-attribute dynamic name="blog-link" value="blog-handle"></custom-attribute>
